attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of car fuel has gone through the roof, I run a small company and provide my own car and recieve 40 pence a mile for the 1st 10000 miles a year and 25 pence for the balance, this only covers the cost of the petrol and leaves nothing to cover the wear and tear insurance and road tax, its about time this allowace was brought inline with the real cost  of running a car for business.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
